original_text: And brought in the offerings and the tithes and the dedicated things faithfully: over which Cononiah the Levite was ruler, and Shimei his brother was the next.
korean_text: 성심으로 그 예물과 십일조와 구별한 물건들을 갖다 두고 레위 사람 고나냐가 그 일의 책임자가 되고 그의 아우 시므이는 부책임자가 되며

sentences.original_text: over which Cononiah the Levite was ruler,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에서 레위 사람 코나냐가 관리자였고

sentences.original_text: and Shimei his brother was the next.
